> *A recursive, reflective POETRY algorithm variant using Goedel-Prover-V2*

**GÃ¶del's Poetry** is an advanced automated theorem proving system that combines Large Language Models (LLMs) with formal verification in Lean 4.

For full documentation, see the [README](https://github.com/KellyJDavis/goedels-poetry/blob/main/README.md) or visit the [official documentation](https://KellyJDavis.github.io/goedels-poetry/).
